data.title: 4 WEEK BEGINNER COURSE BOOKINGS NOW OPEN! Thursday group fully booked. Friday group starts 12 July 2024 09:30 to 11:30 and runs for 4...
data.meta_description:
heysweet.art on June 4, 2024: "4 WEEK BEGINNER COURSE BOOKINGS NOW OPEN!

Thursday group fully booked.

Friday group starts 12 July 2024 09:30 to 11:30 and runs for 4 weeks. Still a few spots available!

Friday Class (09:30 to 11:30) Dates as follows:
- Fri 12 July
- Fri 19 July
Break Fri 26 July
- Fri 2 Aug
- Fri 9 Aug

The course includes 4 x 2 hour weekly lessons hosted in Ranelagh Road in Rondebosch, Cape Town.

This is an in-depth beginner watercolour class and for those who are afraid they're too inexperienced, this is exactly what the course is for!

It is a 4-week beginner course of which the fee is R1400 which includes the 100% cotton watercolour paper pack and pipette. I do allow you to bring your own paints and brushes but also offer a few kit options for you to "add-on" to get the full course experience and have a good foundation set of paints that will last you many years.

All supplies are sourced from Art Savings Club who very graciously supply my materials at a special rate.

Pop me a message if you are interested in booking your spot, or email hello@heysweet.art".
